customer_name: Carvalhos Friends of A Feather Inc.
site_name: Carvalho's Friends of a Feather, Inc.

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
Records were not available for the acquisition, disposition, program of vet care, contingency plan or environmental
enhancement plan for birds at the time of inspection. Specifically during inspection, the following inventory changes were
identified: acquisitions, including transfers from another location (Cassowary, 4 blue and yellow macaws, green wing
macaw, hybrid macaw, Rose breasted cockatoo, Andean Condor and Marabou Stork); dispositions, including sales,
donations and deaths (Scarlet Macaw, Sulfur crested cockatoo, Sun Parakeet, red tailed black cockatoo, great green
macaw, purple gallinule, Chilean flamingoes, Eurasian eagle owl, crested screamer and Mandarin duck) were not
available for review. APHIS officials must be allowed to examine the records required to be kept by the Act and the
regulations in this part, in order to ensure compliance with the regulations.

During routine freeflight at the home facility in late May, a sun parakeet flew off, did not return and was not recovered,
despite recovery procedures. Handling of all animals shall be done as carefully as possible in a manner that does not
cause behavioral stress or physical harm.
Correct from 8 August 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.126(a)(2)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
Records were not available for the acquisition, disposition, program of vet care, contingency plan or environmental 
enhancement plan for birds at the time of inspection. Specifically during inspection, the following inventory changes were 
identified: acquisitions, including transfers from another location (Cassowary, 4 blue and yellow macaws, green wing 
macaw, hybrid macaw, Rose breasted cockatoo, Andean Condor and Marabou Stork); dispositions, including sales, 
donations and deaths (Scarlet Macaw, Sulfur crested cockatoo, Sun Parakeet, red tailed black cockatoo, great green 
macaw, purple gallinule, Chilean flamingoes, Eurasian eagle owl, crested screamer and Mandarin duck) were not 
available for review. APHIS officials must be allowed to examine the records required to be kept by the Act and the 
regulations in this part, in order to ensure compliance with the regulations. 
2.131(b)(1)  Critical
   
Handling of animals. 
During routine freeflight at the home facility in late May, a sun parakeet flew off, did not return and was not recovered, 
despite recovery procedures. Handling of all animals shall be done as carefully as possible in a manner that does not 
cause behavioral stress or physical harm. 
 
Correct from 8 August 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
